# device

**Instance Property**

The device object that created the texture.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

A texture is always associated with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] that created it and can be used only with that device.

## Identifying the shared texture handle

- **label**: A string that identifies the texture.
